
===============
Getting started
===============

What is happycouples?
    Happycouples is a platform for designing invitation  and creating invitation links for marriage ceremony.

How can i create my own marriage invitations?
    You goto create a new app and give path in main urls.py. It is as simple as that.

Is there limit on creating invitational links?
    No, there is not.

What is the expiry date of inviation?
    It does not expire as long as web site is hosted.
